title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
description: He's Ace Ventura: Pet Detective. Jim Carrey is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eyeball to eyeball with a man-eating shark, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. Whether he's undercover, under fire or underwater, he always gets his man… or beast!

reviews.text: Way too inane, Jim Carrey's comic style is a matter of taste. There are some funny bits but too much of it is just stupid. Only for fans of the star. The sequel is better.

This movie is better than the credit it is getting here. I am not a fan of slapstick comedies but this movie does better. Is it silly? Yes, Is it a little inmature? sure. Is it entertaining? Yes it is, very much so. This movie skirts the line wonderfully and gives the little kid inside us all a reason to laugh, without making the adult in us groan.

This was one of Jim Carrey's first, if not first film. Ace Ventura hit the big screens in 1994, and showed what a comedic powerhouse Jim Carrey is. This film showed a new style of humor that emanated from young Jim Carrey. This film revolves around pet detective, Jim Carrey, tracking down a dolphin thief by using a jewel from a world championship ring to provide him with a list if possible suspects, football players. During the film, there are many memorable and iconic scenes that continue to make me laugh to this day. The facial expressions from Carrey in this movie are priceless, and all in all it is a great feel-good film. This films remains to be a classic Jim Carrey film, along with Dumb and Dumber. Fun to watch with the family. 7/10.

It takes a lot of guts to stick to a role like the one Jim Carrey played in this movie, it would have destroyed most actors careers. He is the only one that could have made this movie a success. Because without Jim Carrey, this movie would have been really bad.
Hysterical.  I especially liked the "ballerina" scenes.  Jim Carrey has idiot down to a science.  He is as funny as Jerry Lewis, Jackie Gleason, Dick Van Dyke and many other greats.
Wow, the film's is not very liked by the critics eh? However a lot of users find it funny and good and I have to agree with them. It's not a mind blowing film but it's definitely funny!!
Jim Carrey establishes himself as the go-to guy when just a little over the top simply won't do.

One of Jim Carey's best movies.  You will find that a lot of the reviews are from haughty snobs who are looking for the next Citizens Kane.  The movie was meant to target people in their teens.  I first saw the movie when I was around 13 and of course at that age I found it hilarious.  It introduced a unique comedy with a ton of one amazing one liners.
I can't think of a more annoying protagonist than Jim Carrey's Ace Ventura. The story is just one big headache and anxiety attack after another.

Critics will hate it.  But make no mistake, Ace Ventura birthed the modern comedy scene by being silly, disgusting, and outrageous.  Jim Carrey, an actor that needs no introduction, leads the charge and is the reason why superstar comedy icons found inspiration and room to get crazy on camera.  Before there was Zach Galifianakis, Will Ferrel, and Jonah Hill, there was Jim Carrey.  Only names like Robin Williams dare be mentioned in the same breath.  Only my parents could have ever found this movie forgettable.
A goofy and funny material film for Jim Carrey's performance.

I got a lot of laughs from this. If you hate toilet humor, stay away from this! But if you are fine with this, this is a good movie. Jim Carrey's acting is great, and his stupid antics are hilarious. So not for the easily offended, but a funny movie.

Great outrageous comedy flick, if you dont like Jim Carry or how he asks in his movies you surely wont like this and Id also like to mention you have one pity ass sense of humor if you dont enjoy Ace Venturas...
One of the most outrageously funny films going around. Jim Carrey is riotous.
Ace Ventura shows off just how funny Jim Carrey really is, Imagine Ace Ventura without him, it would suck. One of my favorite Jim Carrey movies ever. Finkel is Einhorn! haha

I wish Ace had more time and freedom to spread his wings, the cast isn't very likable except Carrey himself and the plot bumbles in places... But! the humor and originality of the character is what keeps this afloat. Like a shark or dolphin, Jim Carrey executes every moment with realism and hilarity, score seven for this pooch. A, Loo, Za!

Screw those bad reviews. Ace Ventura is Jim Carrey's best film. I can't believe they don't like it. It's so fun and damn hilarious. One of the only good slapstick comedies. I watched it when I was just 5 and I loved it. And today at 13 it is still a masterpiece!!!
Ace Ventura is a funny classic and a bit pain in the ass ." Jim Carrey gives us a  performance of annoying , Hilarious and a jackass in all his movies" .

A typical good Jim Carrey movie that would never been greenlighted today anymore. You get what you expect: A great comedy experience with a hilariously good Jim Carrey. He has its own style that is not for everyone but really entertaining for many. He was maybe to often typecast with this in his career and nearly vanished until he saved his career with his exceptional performance as Dr. Robotnik in the Sonic movie (which I recommend by the way). This movie started a franchise with 3 movies (1 unknown TV adaptation which I just recently discovered and have yet to watch) and an animated TV series (vanished quickly and I know only a few episodes). Back to the movie: The title explains already a lot. Ace Ventura is a pet detective who saves / searches missing animals. He is an animal rights activists and critical of humans that threat animals poorly. He is Jim Carrey role eccentric, socially unadapted and his methods are unordinary (but successful). He is hired when the dolphin mascot of the Miami Dolphins is kidnapped shortly before the Super Bowl. For those who are not that much invested in sports I should point out that many athletes are superstitious and things like this have huge impacts on motivation and mental attitude. Just research the “Curse of Billy Goat” for example;-). With this the hilarious detective comedy starts. It is a solid story for a comedy. However the make or break point is Jim Carrey’s performance. He is often dividing the audience. Some say he is hilariously funny and the highlight of the movies while others find him annoying and would rate his movies as trash. So this is what you must find out for yourself. For me I enjoy Jim Carrey mostly. There are some exceptions like Cable Guy and small missteps elsewhere. In this franchise I enjoy him as Ace Ventura as most jokes work. This is a fitting transition to the actors / characters, I already explained that Jim Carrey’s performance depends on your own taste of comedy. He is either brilliant or awful for you (Strangely I have not found people in the middle-ground yet). Just as sidenote: He often gets positive and negative awards or nominations for the same movie. Then we have Courteney Cox as Melissa Robinson. She gives a good performance but has not that many screentime. Sean Young as Lois Einhorn is a movie character that would get the film canceled today. Wont say why because of spoilers. The rest of the cast works well but it is a Jim Carrey movie so his hilarious performance outshines their performance somewhat. Special mention for Dan Marino as himself. He is one of the football quarterbacks that is universally acclaimed, set records but sadly never won a Super Bowl. I think I don't need to talk about visuals or soundtrack here. Overall this was an enjoyable ride and I can recommend the movie if you like Jim Carry. I will however say the sequel is better. If you dislike Jim Carrey’s humor / style I would advice to stay away from this movie and possibly from all his movies as it is not suited for you.

While Ace Ventura:Pet Detective is not my favourite of Jim Carrey's movie, it is a lot of fun. It may be a tad too short, and some of the silliness is overdone. But even with any problems, that still doesn't change the fact that I enjoyed this film immensely. The film looks good with the cinematography and scenery top notch. The script is incredibly funny and I like to quote it too. The story is quite silly, but it is a nice one too, and the film is also very snappily paced. Tom Shadyac's direction is also very energetic and imaginative. This was the film that made Jim Carrey an overnight sensation and a fine one it is too to receive that honour. He is excellent in this film, his style of humour mayn't be for everybody, but when he is at his best he is funny or nicely understated as he is in his dramas. All in all, fast, furious and fun. 8/10 Bethany Cox

Jim Carrey does not disappoint in this film, possibly one of his best works. This was the prime time for Carrey and he did not miss up on a great opportunity to play part in a well-executed comedy movie.9/10

Very funny movie. I do kind of wish it focused more on the animals than it did, but it was still pretty good. This movie wouldn't be nearly as good if it wasn't for Jim Carry. He pulled off the role very well.

Ace Ventura - one of the best works of Jim Carrey. Though the movie is also an average on quality, all work is done by Jim Carrey. A plot simple and crazy, but the most important - humour of the events. In general the excellent house movie on one viewing, no more.
N    o    t    W    r    t    i    n    g    A   b   o   u    t    T    h    i    s    !    !    !    !    !    !    !    !    !    !    !
heads up..Ace Ventura: Pet DetectiveThere is some content in there and bits of comic scenes but it doesn't quite mix up even though Jim puts his heart into it.
This movie is a Jim Carrey vehicle but it is an absolute CLASSIC of a film and one of the greatest comedic performances ever filmed.
This movie is kind of a classic.  I actually reference this during a football game the other day.  The laces were in!!!

Thanks in large part to Jim Carrey's cartoonish physical performance, I think I'll always remember this crime spoof as a Looney Tunes episode! I believe this is his best comedic performance ever. But the humor itself in this movie is, surprisingly, quite witty and clever.In its first act and most of its second act, Tom Shadyac fully embraces the movie's goofiness and absurdity, thus generates some inventive and crafty comedy set pieces out of them.In the second half, everything goes gradually downhill. The plot begins to lose its sharpness little by little, as well as the humor, which ends up relying merely on gross-out gags and low-brow, dirty jokes. The movie also has its slow, and monotonous, parts; but this is not before it has delivered some very big laughs that almost made me choke.(7.5/10)
I remember Ace Ventura being a far better comedy and I've watched it plenty during the first decade it was out. Now a lot of it is just cringe and Ace feels so out of place.
Not as good as the Mask but still a Pretty Good or at least Decent film to watch. Jim Carrey up to his hysterical situations again which make up for a very funny yet charming comedy!
Very funny movie. Carrey gives a great performance.
Very funny and goofy movie. Not for snooty ppl i'm guessing by the critics reviews, lol. So many bad reviews, and 1 of the funniest well known comedy movies to date. Crazy!
Surprisingly enjoyable, either in spite of or because of it's goofiness. Jim Carrey never showed less effort in a performance. If you think that's a good thing, then you might like this movie.
This movie is a classic and not to be mistaken with a mature movie genre, because it was hilarious in 99 when i was in middleschool.
It was ok. Some funny parts but most of it is so stupid that you just cant get over it. The acting was a little below average, Carrey was priceless and is the only good thing about this film.

It's an impossibly annoying and almost unbearably asinine at times, but strangely enough, that's where a lot of its appeal comes from. "Ace Ventura: Pet Detective" is one of the quintessential 90s Jim Carrey farce films.
Though quite childish in its humour, Ace Ventura is one of those films that is very much of its time. It also was probably the first film that brought Jim Carrey into the lime light.
Adventurous, but not funny and unassumingly too short. Jim Carrey must be killing his hardcore-comedian career making people laugh with Ace Ventura: Pet Detective.

This presents Jim Carrey in his first starring role, and it is a film focused on his unique brand of madness.  It is always cool to see Elizabeth Perkins and NFL greats in a movie.  This is fun in places--but often very childish.
This is one of the funniest movies ever and the critics always hate funny movies like this and jumanji this movie is very brilliant and funny

The story seems to have been written for children, but the impressive amount of dirty jokes and embarrassing situations that the film throws in our faces illustrates that it is deliberately intended for an adult audience. And sadly not the most intelligent audience.This movie is a rollercoaster and Jim Carrey is in charge of it. It seems like he is doing is best to keep us entertained but wow, the rest of the cast, the story, the environment, the level of jokes are just insufficient. Carrey certainly oozes this insane energy but it contributes to make him seem totally out of the plot. Like an idiot in the middle of a regular village.If the beginning of the story is particularly childish, the rest of it totally falls apart loudly, becomes as confusing as it needs to be for Jim Carrey to deliver his pathetic jokes and impressive facial mimics. It definitely seems like this movie is a desperate way to showcase his abilities out of any context.
Funny in some parts boring in some the second one is much better in its script.
Very entertaining comedy. Perfect Jim Carrey movie. Loved the humor and shock value.
Absolutely hilarious. I remember watching this when I was a child and literally spitting out my milkshake once BC of how funny this film is. There are a few cringe moments but they hardly matter.
